website_summaries.verdict: A budget option for a quick and easy-to-apply tire shiner in a spray bottle.
pros: The extra wet-black shine offers one of the brightest, most extreme shines available
Final product creates an extra layer of durability and protection
cons: The tire shine can leave streaks on the rubber if not wiped down properly after application

customer_reviews.title: Came in 3rd place in my test!
customer_reviews.text: I did a tire shine show down and ArmorAll Extreme Tire Shine took 3rd place in my test. There were 8 products. I was impressed. This beat out, carfident, Black magic, meguires and many others. The test took just over two weeks to complete. Look for the video.
customer_reviews.author: JoeteckTips

customer_reviews.title: This one is my favorite. Easy and quick to apply and doesn't leave ...
customer_reviews.text: I've used so many tire shine products that promise the world. This one is my favorite. Easy and quick to apply and doesn't leave a mess or a streak along the side of my truck when I go. It literally lasts for about two weeks. Others claim the same, yet only last a couple days at best. If money was no object, I would still buy this product. This two-pack is convenient for me. I will continue to buy this product for all my vehicles.
customer_reviews.author: CHRISTOPHER S ZAMBELLO

customer_reviews.title: Tire protection
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this product for 3 years and love the look of the tire when applied. Simply wash vehicle, including tires, and spray on (no need to dry tire first. Leave it sit for an hour and your tires will have UV protection as well as that new, wet tire look.
customer_reviews.author: Jan Figone

customer_reviews.title: no depth, no gloss
customer_reviews.text: Do not purchase this product. I cleaned my tires first w/a product specific for that. Then this product applied once washed off and dry. Did NOT blacken. No depth, no gloss. I tried to give it away to a friend, he wouldn't take it. I have used it once, and will discard the two bottles. Irrespective of the sale, 2:1, it is worthless, compared to other products.
customer_reviews.author: Scott Einhorn

customer_reviews.title: Not as good as standard ArmorAll
customer_reviews.text: It's funny that they call this product "Extreme Tire Shine," because it does not even work as well as regular ArmorAll when it comes to making tires shine. It cleans off grime well enough, but I don't find that the tires pop as well as their other products.
customer_reviews.author: JETT LAW

customer_reviews.title: This product brought a medium shine to my tires but it took 3 coats.
customer_reviews.text: This product is certainly better than nothing, but I was hoping for a truly shiny appearance to my tires and this particular product did not do it. It is a good thing you get 2 bottles because the product will be used up in just a few washes of my vehicle. I followed the directions, but if there is something I should be doing to enhance the products effect on my tires I am open for suggestios.
customer_reviews.author: Jacqualine A.

customer_reviews.title: If you hand wash your car then there's no reason to use anything but this.
customer_reviews.text: This has been by far the best tire shine I've used! I have tried a couple other brands and even the FW1 tire shine does not hold a candle to this. It's slick, slightly oily but my God does it last!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great shine, but..
customer_reviews.text: Great shine on the tire, but if you have chrome wheels, dont get any on them! I did and it took like 15 minute per wheel to get this stuff of them.
customer_reviews.author: David Rhodes

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t stay shiny
customer_reviews.text: Applied Sunday and it’s already matte black on Tuesday. Product is difficult to apply and makes a mess on wheels which needs to be wiped off. The remaining residue attracts dirt onto the wheels. Generally just awful. Not sure I will even finish the bottles I have.
customer_reviews.author: Ariel

customer_reviews.title: Love the shine; hate the applicator
customer_reviews.text: The shine is great. The spray applicator stinks. I would prefer the foam version and will purchase this in the future. The spray gets all over the place and has to be chased with a rag. Very messy. That said, the shine is brilliant.
customer_reviews.author: Frank Natale

customer_reviews.title: Works for multiple items
customer_reviews.text: We use them on all our wheels and even farm applications with rubber. But... The coolest thing that I use it for is to spray and coat our window plastic shutters. It restores the shutters back to close to factory color. :)
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Ok product
customer_reviews.text: Tires shine nicE Nd dries but somewhat sticky. Don’t spray it in your driveway as it leaves a stain you just can’t get rid of. Hopefully it disappears over time.
customer_reviews.author: Happy Camper

customer_reviews.title: Not as effective as compressed cannisterl version.
customer_reviews.text: More difficult to get an even spread than using the compressed cannister spray.
customer_reviews.author: Balanced Reviewer

customer_reviews.title: Oooooh, Shiney.  Aaaaaaw, doesn't last.
customer_reviews.text: Give a shine like patent leather or a marines dress shoes. Two days later, still somewhat blacker than untreated new tires, but no shine
customer_reviews.author: F. Locke

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I have been buying and using this for just over a year. It is the best tire shine I have ever used. I keep a couple bottles on hand at all times.
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: Great Shine
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my husband and he likes how it works on our truck , it was very reasonably priced and I will be purchasing from this seller again.
customer_reviews.author: mamabear

customer_reviews.title: Nice wet look finish
customer_reviews.text: This is my new Tyre shine product from now on! I don’t have to wipe anything away from the wheel and it looks really good.
customer_reviews.author: Moon

customer_reviews.title: Well worth it
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is a necessity if you want your tires to shine. Easy to apply and shine is good for at least a week. Great price too!!
customer_reviews.author: Ella

customer_reviews.title: Weak
customer_reviews.text: In order to get that car wash shine one must use large amounts on a sponge to accomplish this Few pumps from the bottle doesn’t shine very well Little disappointing
customer_reviews.author: Fazio7

customer_reviews.title: Worth the buy
customer_reviews.text: Shined very well. and lasts on the road. Buy a tire shine applicator sponge to apply with ease
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Ballard

customer_reviews.title: Easy to apply. Do get some splash while driving.
customer_reviews.text: Doesn’t last as long as I thought. It rained and now tires are dull and it has been sitting.
customer_reviews.author: Lee Rogers Sr

customer_reviews.title: Not great
customer_reviews.text: Shine really is not “extreme,” and does not last more than a couple days. Back to using Meguirs.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca K.

customer_reviews.title: Makes tires look new
customer_reviews.text: Gives tires the wet and new look. It’ll take a lot if you have big tires though.
customer_reviews.author: Sam Wood

customer_reviews.title: This stuff is awesome
customer_reviews.text: Works extremely well, just wish it came with a little more quantity. You’ll probably be able to get a little more than 8 tires done with one bottle, but seems to last for several weeks.
customer_reviews.author: Justin

customer_reviews.title: Slings lust like the other spray-ons.
customer_reviews.text: Even after letting the stuff dry an hour longer than the directions said to, it slung crap from my front fender to the tailgate.
customer_reviews.author: K. Petersen

customer_reviews.title: great product.
customer_reviews.text: I have used other tire products but this ob is the best I have found easy to use and it lasts.
customer_reviews.author: Jerry K.

customer_reviews.title: Armour All Shine
customer_reviews.text: great price for 2 can't beat that , and keeps my tires a real shine that's what i like!!!!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Efrain Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: Long Lasting Shine! Great Value from a great brand !
customer_reviews.text: The price was right , long lasting shine on your tires. Because it’s Armor All It works well on the interior as well!
customer_reviews.author: Eric G Mitchell

customer_reviews.title: Good shine.
customer_reviews.text: Give the tires a nice clean shiny black finish. Exactly what I was looking for.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good quality product.
customer_reviews.text: This is my favorite tire shine. Goes on easy and has a nice finish when dried. Highly reccomend. Wipe off excess from your wheel if it runs.
customer_reviews.author: Tonya

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: It sprays on easily. However, it’s not the shiniest product that I’ve seen. For the price, ease of use, and quantity I give it 4 stars.
customer_reviews.author: First Sergeant

customer_reviews.title: Easy application
customer_reviews.text: The product arrived on time. Easy to apply and great results.
customer_reviews.author: R C.

customer_reviews.title: Horrible Quality
customer_reviews.text: The spray bottle does not evenly distribute the product on the tire. After following the instructions on the bottle, it always results in blotchy wet marks. The product itself is horrible as well. It claims to last for weeks, yet on our commercial AND personal vehicles the "wet" look is only present for about 3 days; again being blotchy at best. I, nor my company, will EVER buy this brand again.
customer_reviews.author: Greenleaf Rent A Car

customer_reviews.title: Glossy tires
customer_reviews.text: Bought two spray bottles and a package of three tire sponges. A perfectly easy and quick birthday present for anyone who likes their tires glossy and new looking.
customer_reviews.author: ChrissyCat

customer_reviews.title: Tire Shine application
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't wash off from rain.Great for my tire shine.Makes the wheels and tires stand out.Thank you
customer_reviews.author: Clarence R Jackson

customer_reviews.title: Works fine
customer_reviews.text: It works fine but there are better products out there
customer_reviews.author: SolutionsOnlineSales

customer_reviews.title: Good experience
customer_reviews.text: Good product, good price, and rapid delivery. Will buy again.
customer_reviews.author: DLW

customer_reviews.title: Good, not great
customer_reviews.text: I tend to use this after a car wash by applying a coat or two and leaving the car parked overnight. Slings a crap ton. Good shine and appearance, even lasts a few washes if you do it right. Haven’t been able to figure out how to get the high quality shine without the sling. Good, not great.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: These work very well
customer_reviews.text: These work very well. Tire stats stays shiny for a long time
customer_reviews.author: SL

customer_reviews.title: What a Shine!
customer_reviews.text: Follow the directions and you will get a great long lasting shine on your tires. Easy to apply . Great product.
customer_reviews.author: Derek P McCleskey

customer_reviews.title: Simply spray on and leave
customer_reviews.text: Extreme Tire Shine takes the hard work out of the finishing touch for your car!
customer_reviews.author: Missy Gail

customer_reviews.title: Great vinyl shutters cleaner.
customer_reviews.text: Probably cheaper products out there but I went with this brand. Used it to clean vinyl shutters. They look great!
customer_reviews.author: Begien

customer_reviews.title: Not so great
customer_reviews.text: Gave a ok shine but whatever they use at the carwash is 10× better. Was expected more gloss on the shine.
customer_reviews.author: pete

customer_reviews.title: Makes your car tires look sexy
customer_reviews.text: Leaves the car tires clean and shiny for a long time!
customer_reviews.author: Gerardo Garcia

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I like this product and was simply buying more..........Considering everything this two pack was a good price!
customer_reviews.author: Robert B

customer_reviews.title: Great Value!
customer_reviews.text: Product worked well, easy to apply, and a great value. Not sure if the tires were extremely shined but did the job.
customer_reviews.author: Bob Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Wanted a more natural tire finish— matted not shiny.
customer_reviews.text: Is not a product with a matted finish but high shine and not what I wanted.
customer_reviews.author: Harv

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: This product keeps your old tires looking new! Works great if you are into detailing your car.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Uchida

customer_reviews.title: Ideal
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for car enthusiasts that want to keep their car clean and shiny
customer_reviews.author: Nomad.18

customer_reviews.title: love that tire shine!
customer_reviews.text: These make my tires look great and its so easy to use the "buy again" button!
customer_reviews.author: monte turpin

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful product
customer_reviews.text: Love the product. One of the bottles broke in the shipping. Obviously didn’t like that part, but love the product.
customer_reviews.author: William John Britton, IV

customer_reviews.title: Great product gives shine
customer_reviews.text: The tires look like new after using this for a few weeks
customer_reviews.author: L Pardo

customer_reviews.title: great product
customer_reviews.text: I have always used this product, always will ,makes my hemi challenger look great thanks
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I'm very happy with this tire shine
customer_reviews.text: I'm very happy with this tire shine. This makes my car look great and clean with just couples of spray.
customer_reviews.author: Jell Zony

customer_reviews.title: Fades quickly
customer_reviews.text: The shine only lasts for a day. Armour All way better
customer_reviews.author: Bobby Burton

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use - spry on and walk away
customer_reviews.text: No product last a long time but this is the same as all the rest in my opinion. Easy to use yes. looks great when used. cost is a little high but it works well for a little while.
customer_reviews.author: D. Long

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: This is a GREAT product. I bought this many times. Even better the price was very cheap for 1 but got 2 for one. GREATEST
customer_reviews.author: Joe

product_meta.title: Armor All Extreme Tire Shine (22 oz.) - 2 Pack
feature_bullets: Most Extreme Wet, Black Shine! Trusted Armor All Protection
Extra gloss enhancers for intense, mirror-like shine
Conditions, nourishes, & preserves your tires' rich black look
Protects from harmful elements that can cause cracking & fading

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars518 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
